mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, depth, menu_name, component_name, sort_order, use_yn FROM menu WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY depth, sort_order, id
SELECT id, parent_id, depth, menu_name, component_name, sort_order, use_yn FROM menu WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (parent_id, depth, menu_name, component_name, sort_order, use_yn) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{depth}, #{menuName}, #{componentName}, #{sortOrder}, #{useYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, depth = #{depth}, menu_name = #{menuName}, component_name = #{componentName}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, use_yn = #{useYn} WHERE id = #{id}
